meta-review.comment: Beneath the shadows of dragons and cyberpunk lies an RPG gem worth its weight in credsticks. Shadowrun Dragonfall Director's Cut is a glorious mix of tactical combat, engaging storytelling, and a world you'll want to dive into. Whether you're new to the series or a seasoned runner, this game will grab you by the throat and not let go. With a meta-score of 88, this game is a must-play for any RPG fan.
